event.description: Gorkys Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Brandon Belt flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
Hunter Pence grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Buster Posey strikes out swinging.
Brandon Crawford pops out to catcher Jeff Mathis in foul territory.
Eduardo Nunez grounds out sharply, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Chris Marrero grounds out, second baseman Daniel Descalso to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Aaron Hill homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Jeff Samardzija strikes out swinging.
Gorkys Hernandez grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Brandon Belt walks.
Hunter Pence flies out to left fielder Chris Herrmann.
Buster Posey flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
With Brandon Crawford batting, Brandon Belt steals (1) 2nd base.

Brandon Crawford singles on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Herrmann. Brandon Belt scores. Brandon Crawford out at 2nd on the throw, left fielder Chris Herrmann to third baseman Jake Lamb to second baseman Daniel Descalso.
Eduardo Nunez grounds out sharply, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Chris Marrero strikes out swinging.
Aaron Hill walks.
Jeff Samardzija strikes out swinging.
Gorkys Hernandez grounds out, third baseman Jake Lamb to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Brandon Belt strikes out swinging.
Hunter Pence walks.
With Buster Posey batting, passed ball by Jeff Mathis, Hunter Pence to 2nd.
Buster Posey doubles (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Herrmann. Hunter Pence scores.
Pitching Change: Jorge De La Rosa replaces Robbie Ray, batting 9th.
Brandon Crawford walks.
Eduardo Nunez walks. Buster Posey to 3rd. Brandon Crawford to 2nd.
Chris Marrero flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
Pitching Change: Randall Delgado replaces Jorge De La Rosa, batting 9th, replacing Jeremy Hazelbaker.
Aaron Hill lines out to shortstop Chris Owings.
Joe Panik grounds out sharply, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Gorkys Hernandez reaches on a fielding error by second baseman Daniel Descalso.
Brandon Belt grounds out, pitcher Randall Delgado to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Hunter Pence flies out to right fielder David Peralta in foul territory.
Buster Posey doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Herrmann.
Pitching Change: Andrew Chafin replaces Randall Delgado, batting 9th.
Brandon Crawford grounds out, first baseman Paul Goldschmidt to pitcher Andrew Chafin. Buster Posey to 3rd.
Eduardo Nunez grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Pitching Change: J. Hoover replaces Andrew Chafin, batting 9th, replacing Nick Ahmed.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Conor Gillaspie replaces Ty Blach.
Conor Gillaspie flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.

Chris Owings strikes out swinging.
Chris Herrmann singles on a line drive to center fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Daniel Descalso strikes out on a foul tip.

Robbie Ray singles on a ground ball to second baseman Aaron Hill.
A. J. Pollock grounds into a double play, third baseman Eduardo Nunez to second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Brandon Belt. Robbie Ray out at 2nd.
David Peralta homers (1) on a line drive to left field.
Paul Goldschmidt homers (2) on a fly ball to center field.

Chris Owings grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Brandon Belt.

Jeff Mathis strikes out swinging.
Robbie Ray strikes out swinging.
A. J. Pollock strikes out swinging.
David Peralta walks.
Paul Goldschmidt singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence. David Peralta to 2nd.
Jake Lamb homers (2) on a fly ball to center field. David Peralta scores. Paul Goldschmidt scores.
Chris Owings lines out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Chris Herrmann walks.
Daniel Descalso singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence. Chris Herrmann to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Hunter Strickland replaces Jeff Samardzija, batting 7th.
Defensive switch from second base to left field for Aaron Hill.
Defensive Substitution: Joe Panik replaces pitcher Jeff Samardzija, batting 9th, playing second base.

David Peralta doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Aaron Hill. J. Pollock scores.
